description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Conduct software development, maintenance or technology investigation/research projects for Toshiba industrial products or ICT solutions from requirement analysis to delivery phase, strictly complying company’s standard engineering & quality management processes.
              
              Specific activities include followings (but may not limited at):
              
              •	Contribute in analysing user needs and software requirements to determine feasibility of software solution.
              
              •	Investigate & gather knowledge of new technologies & new industrial business domain to determine software solution and/or conduct domain-specific software engineering.
              
              •	Contribute in complex low level design/program design and high-level design of less complex feature areas.
              
              •	Responsible for implementing, customizing, maintaining & debugging software solution.
              
              •	Contribute to test plan & test design; Develop & execute test cases for both low level and high level testing.
              
              •	Create customer documentation & test reports.
              
              •	Review of work done by peers.
              
              •	Contribute in system integration, fixing of bugs reported by customer.
              
              •	Maintain good relationship with customers and teamwork spirit with fellow team members.
              
              •	Conduct training/coaching for junior members in software development if requested.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Education
              
              •	Bachelor degree or equivalent in Information Technology, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Telecommunication Engineering
              

              Required Knowledge/Skills and Experience
              
              •	Firm knowledge of computer science & software engineering: fundamental computer science, general programming skills, software design, software debugging, software documentation, software testing, software development process.
              
              •	Skillful at one of common programming languages: C++, Java, C#, C Embedded, Web (JS, Spring, HTML5, )…etc.
              
              •	Strong analytical skills, problem-solving skills and the ability to pay careful attention to detail.
              
              •	High capability of self-studying/investigating new technologies & new business domains on demand.
              
              •	Self-awareness, good sense of responsibility, result-oriented and deadline commitment.
              
              •	Capacity to work well in groups and a willingness to understand the various roles played by fellow team members.
              
              •	Appropriate English language fluency (verbal & written) is basic requirement; Japanese language is an advantage.
              
              •	Working experiences in software development industry, especially, in offshore companies for Japanese customers is an advantage.
              
              •	Willing for short term/long term business trip and/or onsite working in Japan.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
